definition: Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to take a step/to stride

sentences.english: There is also a National museum in Chiangmai .
sentences.chinese: 還有一個國家博物館清邁。

sentences.english: Lung Chai is a rice farmer in Chiang Mai.
sentences.chinese: 瓏齋是清邁的一個稻農。

sentences.english: The next year in 2006, Chiang Mai Tzu Chi School held its first graduation ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 清邁慈濟學校並在2006年，舉辦首屆結業典禮。

sentences.english: Speaking of Thailand, on the streets all around Chiang Mai there are purified bottle refill stations for big 5 liter water bottles.
sentences.chinese: 說到泰國，在清邁的街道有5升狀的水瓶供水的水站。

sentences.english: New golf courses have been opened in Chiangmai for the last two years.
sentences.chinese: 上兩年開始在清邁打高爾夫球有新的行程選擇。

sentences.english: After the Star Awards, I went for a vacation with my whole family to Chiangmai.
sentences.chinese: 紅星大獎之後，我就帶全家出國，到泰國的清邁度假。

sentences.english: A plain 20 years old teenager from a rural town of Chiangmai, was then just another unadorned contestant.
sentences.chinese: 一個單純的20歲年輕人，來自從清邁的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: Nola has volunteered with Care for Dogs in Chiang Mai, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 諾拉在泰國清邁的關愛狗兒中心做志願者。

sentences.english: Herbarium, Department of Biology, Faculty of Science, Chiang Mai University, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 標本室，生物系，理學院，清邁大學，泰國。

sentences.english: I want to book a ticket from Penang to Chiang Mai, Thailand for Tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我想訂一張明天從檳城飛泰國清邁的票子。
